title: Why is CFPUA allowed to change their rates with bills effective May 1 when 50 of the past 60 days of my usage were during the old lessor rate.  It\'s like getting gas in April for $3.50 gallon and getting your bill in May and they charge you $3.85 gallon. What gives??? And WHY are they allowed this practice??
text:
Here's a link to the answer to your question.



http://www.myreporter.com/?p=11439
